company.name: Molly Maid of North Orlando, Seminole and Volusia County

contact.address: 1052 W State Rd 436, #2066, Altamonte Springs, FL, 32714

offerings.name: One-Time Cleaning
offerings.description: Professional one-time cleaning for events, spring cleaning, or catch-up.

offerings.name: Recurring Cleans
offerings.description: Weekly, bi-weekly, or custom-schedule recurring cleaning.

custom_cleaning.description: Flexible plans based on customer’s unique needs and preferences.

neighborly_done_right_promise.description: If not satisfied, call by next business day and they'll fix it free.
neighborly_done_right_promise.conditions: Must report by end of next business day.

individual_reviews.comment: Very professional. Requested Naydelin and Route again.
Quick, easy, and professional. Great job by Heather & Haley.
Zee and Gladys did a great job. Pleasant and efficient.
Team #6 did an outstanding job and were compassionate.
Lexi and Anabel were productive and professional.
Rebecca and Alyssa (Team 4) did an awesome job.

faqs.question: How does your maid service work in Orlando and Seminole County?
faqs.answer: Call or visit online for a free estimate; customized plans; satisfaction guaranteed if contacted by next business day.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my appointment?
faqs.answer: Yes, up to 72 hours in advance.

faqs.question: What products do you use?
faqs.answer: Industry-leading cleaning supplies. Call for details.

faqs.question: What is the Neighborly Done Right Promise®?
faqs.answer: If dissatisfied, report by next business day and they'll fix it at no charge.

careers.description: Opportunity to grow into a career. Respectful and supportive work culture.
